newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: SOCCER-COACH VAN GAAL TO LEAVE AJAX AT END-SEASON, ANP SAYS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-COACH VAN GAAL TO LEAVE AJAX AT END-SEASON, ANP SAYS.

text.p: Coach Louis Van Gaal is to leave Dutch champions Ajax Amsterdam at the end of the season, the ANP news agency said on Thursday.
Van Gaal, 45, took over as coach from Leo Beenhakker in September 1991. He had previously been assistant coach and had been in charge of the youth team.
Under Van Gaal Ajax won three Dutch championships, the Dutch cup, the European Champions' Cup, the UEFA Cup, the Super Cup and the World Club Cup.
Last season Ajax failed to retain their European crown, losing to Juventus on penalties in Rome.
Ajax currently lie an unaccustomed sixth in the Dutch league table.
